DOC.brief_summary: This cross-sectional study enrol 200 outpatients/inpatients treatment resistant partial epilepsy least two year , receive 1-3 AEDS . The study consist one two visit , last 1-2 hour . All subject complete Visit 1 . Twenty five percent subject return Visit 2 . The study assess prevalence depression suicidal thought feasibility use propose psychiatric rating scale future epilepsy clinical trial . This study also provide estimate proportion patient epilepsy ( PWE ) may ineligible future trial .
DOC.detailed_description: In light recent issue regard antiepileptic drug suicidality , The Epilepsy Study Consortium propose pilot study . Several scale assess suicidality screen depression anxiety disorder administer group epilepsy patient characteristic similar patient usually enrol epilepsy clinical trial . The study assess prevalence depression , suicidal thought , behavior feasibility use propose psychiatric rating scale future epilepsy clinical trial . This study also provide estimate proportion patient epilepsy may ineligible future trial active suicidal thought last 6 month , suicidal behavior last 2 year current major depressive episode .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Partial epilepsy least two year , confirm EEG study Aged 18 70 yearsold Proficient English Having minimum 4th grade read level Having stable dos type AEDs previous two month Have least 1 observable partial seizure ( simple partial motor component , complex partial secondarily generalize tonic clonic seizure ) per month past 6 month Is currently receive 13 AEDs Has fail least 2 AEDs ( include current therapy ) Exclusion criterion : Nonepileptic seizure without comorbid epileptic seizure Subjects currently carry diagnosis major psychotic disorder Subjects currently take investigational medication Subjects know history alcoholism , drug abuse , drug addiction within past 2 year
